# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

include_directories(${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.GRAPH_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${BASE_CXX_FLAGS}")


File(GLOB runtimepytests "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/base/test_*.py")
set(pytests ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_comparisons.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_directories.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_exceptions.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_file.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_log.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_objects.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_python_flags.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_random.py ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_typemaps.py )

foreach (test ${runtimepytests} ${pytests})
  GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
  if(EXISTS "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/base/${name}.pytests")
    FILE(READ "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/base/${name}.pytests" contents)
    STRING(REGEX REPLACE ";" "\\\\;" contents "${contents}")
    STRING(REGEX REPLACE "\n" ";" contents "${contents}")
    foreach(testline ${contents})
      string(REGEX REPLACE "([A-Za-z0-9_]+\\.[A-Za-z0-9_]+) (.*)" 
                           "\\1;\\2" split "${testline}")
      list(GET split 0 methname)
      list(GET split 1 docstring)
      add_test("base.${name}.${methname}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh ${IMP_PYTHON} ${test} "${methname}")
      set_tests_properties("base.${name}.${methname}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.base;test")
      set_tests_properties("base.${name}.${methname}" PROPERTIES MEASUREMENT "docstring=${docstring}")
    endforeach()
  else()
    add_test("base.${name}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh ${IMP_PYTHON} ${test})
    set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.base;test")
  endif()
endforeach(test)

set(cpp_tests ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_cache.cpp ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_pair_memoizer.cpp ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/base/test/test_show.cpp )

foreach (test ${cpp_tests})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
   add_executable("base.${name}" ${test})
   target_link_libraries("base.${name}"     imp_base
    
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.GRAPH_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/base/"
                         OUTPUT_NAME ${name})
   add_test("base.${name}" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/setup_environment.sh
            "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/base/${name}")
   set_tests_properties("base.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.base;test")
   set(executables ${executables} "base.${name}")
endforeach(test)

add_custom_target("imp_base_tests" ALL DEPENDS ${executables})
